name: WreckittyPets
description:
This game is one made in the frame of Open Jam.

How to play:

Use W,A,S,D to run and shift to sprint!

Run away from your friend and let him cause as much wreckage as you can!

The link to the github which will let you rebuild the game at home and see all of the code and giggles! : https://github.com/ben43/OpenJam

THE  ACTUAL DOWNLOAD OF THE GAME IS AT THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE

The open source software we used are :

-Blender

-Krita

-Github

People who worked on it :
